ai-patthana15.14:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.14:1.1_0: Because of causes and conditions for the sake of inferiority.
ai-patthana15.14:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.14:2.1_0: For the sake of not the middle realm, nor for the sake of causes and conditions. ...
ai-patthana15.14:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.14:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the reason for the sake of speaking, for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana15.14:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
